Applications are for individuals and personal use purposes only.

eligibility.additionalValue: You must be an Australian citizen or Australian resident to hold an account with Great Southern Bank

fees.name: Establishment Fee
fees.additionalInfo:
An establishment fee applies to all credit facilities and includes the cost of processing the application and the preparation of the Great Southern Bank loan
documentation.

discounts.description: Establishment fee waived when applying online

eligibility.additionalInfo: Offer includes $0 Establishment Fee and is open to new or existing customers applying for a minimum application amount of $100,000 or more. Excludes applications for Internal Refinance of existing facilities. Applications must be received between 31/08/2022 and 30/06/2025 and settled by 30/09/2025. To be eligible to apply online you must be at least 18 years of age, a permanent resident of Australia, applying for yourself or as a married/defacto couple and buying an existing property or refinancing. Great Southern Bank may withdraw or amend this offer at any time without notice.

fees.name: Telegraphic transfer fee within Australia
fees.additionalInfo: Local telegraphic transfer to an account at a financial institution within Australia. Payable where you request a local telegraphic transfer to an account at a financial institution within Australia.

fees.name: Account Information Fee
fees.additionalInfo:
Account informaton fee is payable when customer request the following:
- An annual audit certificate on a Great Southern Bank account
- A copy of a cheque or Visa voucher
- Personal information, traces, document copies (other than those specified above) and/or information pertaining to an account
Where further investigation is required an additional hourly rate of $20 per hour will apply. An estimate of the costs involved will be provided prior to the work being undertaken.

fees.name: Valuation fee
fees.additionalInfo: The establishment fee for non Rate Breaker home loans covers the cost of one valuation. A valuation fee may be payable in the future if Great Southern Bank considers it necessary to revalue the property at any time. The amount of the fee will be subject to the Great Southern Bank panel valuers scale of fees current at that time.

fees.name: Home Guarantee Scheme LMI Premium
fees.additionalInfo:
Applicable only to eligible loans participating in the Home Guarantee 
Schemes including the First Home Guarantee (previously know as the 
First Home Loan Deposit Scheme), New Home Guarantee, Family Home 
Guarantee or Regional First Home Buyer Guarantee. If the Guarantee Certificate expires or is otherwise discharged due to an act or omission undertaken by you or a guarantor, Great Southern Bank may seek to obtain lenders’ mortgage insurance (LMI) in respect of the Loan and in that case, you must pay this fee to reimburse Great Southern Bank for the cost incurred in obtaining LMI. For Contracts entered into prior to 22 June 2022, the applicable premium amount is referred to as a FHLDS LMI Premium or Family Home Guarantee LMI Premium.

fees.name: Arrears Letter Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable where Great Southern Bank sends you a letter in relation to arrears on your account.

fees.name: Default Notice Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Default notice fee is payable where Great Southern Bank sends you a default notice in relation to outstanding arrears on your account.

fees.name: Split Loan Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Split loan fee is payable a split involves two or more separate facilities (accounts). Customers can elect to split their loan facility at time of application.

fees.name: Fixed rate lock fee
fees.additionalInfo: A Fixed Rate Lock fee is payable to each fixed rate loan where the borrower has requested to have Fixed Rate Lock on their home loan application.

fees.name: Early Payout Cost (EPC)
fees.additionalInfo: When you enter into a fixed rate loan contract, you are effectively locking in the loan interest rate offered to you for an agreed period of time (e.g. 5 years). If you decide to switch or payout your fixed rate loan before the end of your agreed period, you are effectively breaking that fixed rate loan agreement, an EPC that could cost you thousands of dollars may apply. Please refer to our ‘Early Payout Cost Factsheet’ for more information. Contracts entered into prior to 28 September 2021, the amount is referred to as an Early Payout Fee.

fees.name: Debt Collection Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Costs incurred in the recovery of outstanding debts vary depending on the nature of the default.  These costs are applied by the Solicitors or independent contractors engaged to undertake action to recover the funds and are debited to the account that is "out of order".

fees.name: Security Adminstration Fee
fees.additionalInfo:
For each security offered to the Great Southern Bank loan. A securities administration fee applies to all secured credit facilities. The securities administration fee represents the average cost based on typical charges incurred in settling loans, including: 
• Progressive drawdowns 
• Bank cheque fee 
• Agent fee 
• Land title search 
• Credit reference fee 
• PPSR searches 
• PPSR charges

fees.name: Discharge Fee
fees.additionalInfo: If you pay out the loan partially or in full where a discharge of security is required, or you request a discharge of a security, a discharge fee is payable (per release or transaction).

fees.name: Redraw Fee
fees.additionalInfo: $200 minimum withdrawal applies in branch.

fees.name: Production Fee
fees.additionalInfo: If you request a title held by Great Southern Bank to be produced to a relevant state’s land titles office for any purpose, a production fee is payable.

fees.name: Re-documentation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Where a borrower requests, and Great Southern Bank agrees, to a restructure of a loan between approval and funding and that change requires amended documentation to be prepared, a fee will be payable.

fees.name: Variation Fee
fees.additionalInfo:
A variation fee is payable if you request any changes to the Credit Contract or Security - for example:
- Re-arrange and/or substitute a security on a mortgage
- Consent to any dealings in relation to property
- Switch from one interest rate product to another, at the request of the borrower
- Where a fixed interest rate has decreased between loan approval and loan funding, at the request of the borrower.

fees.name: Government fees and charges
fees.additionalInfo: Government fees and charges relating to stamp duty and registration are payable on an event causing a change or variation to the transaction and/or security being taken in the applicable state or territory. The amount of the fee will be subject to the relevant government scale of fees current at that time.

fees.name: Solicitors costs
fees.additionalInfo: Solicitors costs are payable where they are engaged to prepare documents or provide advice relating to your matter on Great Southern Bank’s behalf.

lendingRates.additionalValue: P36M
lendingRates.additionalInfo: Interest Only repayment: 90% maximum LVR inclusive of Lenders Mortgage Insurance (LMI).

detailData.name: 3 year Fixed Rate INV IO
detailData.description: Lock in your interest rate for 1, 2, 3 or 5 years with our fixed rate home loan and know what your repayments will be. Plus, pay off your loan sooner with free extra repayments.

listData.name: 2 year Fixed Rate INV IO
listData.description: Lock in your interest rate for 1, 2, 3 or 5 years with our fixed rate home loan and know what your repayments will be. Plus, pay off your loan sooner with free extra repayments.

features.additionalInfo: Enjoy free redraw.  Access your additional home loan repayments with redraw, so you can use it whenever you need some breathing space. A $200 minimum withdrawal amount applies for redraws conducted in-branch.
$0 Monthly or annual fees.
Wherever you are in the world, Great Southern Bank gives you the choice and control to securely manage all of your accounts on a range of devices, the way you want.
A  guarantor is someone who promises to repay money that is owed to us under a loan, if for some reason the borrower doesn’t.

Up to $30,000 in total extra payments permitted during the fixed rate period. A daily transfer will refund any amounts paid in advance in excess of the total advance repayments allowed during the fixed rate period unless sufficient to pay out the loan in full (in which case an Early Payout Cost may apply). Excess funds will be transferred to the nominated deposit account, which must remain open for the fixed rate period.

Green Home offer Eligibility Criteria:
A minimum Nationwide House Energy Rating Scheme (NatHERS) rating of 7.5 or above from a NatHERS-accredited assessor.
Been constructed within the last 12 months (for existing properties)

Green Home offer Eligibility Criteria for the Australian Capital Territory:
A NatHERS certificate completed by a NatHERS-accredited assessor showing a rating of at least 7.5.

detailData.name: Basic Variable Investment IO
detailData.description: Save with a Great Southern Bank Basic Variable Home Loan. It’s a simple, competitive rate home loan with no monthly or annual fees and the ability to make unlimited extra repayments.

listData.name: Offset Variable Investment IO
listData.description: A premium home loan complete with 100% offset and a competitive rate. Get to your property destination faster while saving on interest.

features.additionalInfo: Enjoy free redraw.  Access your additional home loan repayments with redraw, so you can use it whenever you need some breathing space. A $200 minimum withdrawal amount applies for redraws conducted in-branch.

Offset your interest to save.  Save on the amount of interest you pay and reduce your loan term by offsetting the combined balances of your Great Southern Bank everyday accounts with a free 100% Multi-Account Offset facility. You must maintain a minimum balance of $500 in each offset account to obtain the benefit of the offset from that account. Your offset account will not earn any interest.
$0 Monthly or annual fees.
Wherever you are in the world, Great Southern Bank gives you the choice and control to securely manage all of your accounts on a range of devices, the way you want.
A  guarantor is someone who promises to repay money that is owed to us under a loan, if for some reason the borrower doesn’t.
Reach your property goal sooner. Enjoy the flexibility of being able to make unlimited extra repayments without penalty.

constraints.additionalInfo: Minimum application amount of $100,000; or  switching or restructuring of the home loan you already have with us when it includes new borrowing of at least $10,000.

eligibility.additionalInfo: To be 18 or over
Applications are for individuals and personal use purposes only.

eligibility.additionalValue: You must be an Australian citizen or Australian resident to hold an account with Great Southern Bank

fees.name: Establishment Fee
fees.additionalInfo:
An establishment fee applies to all credit facilities and includes the cost of processing the application and the preparation of the Great Southern Bank loan
documentation.

discounts.description: Establishment fee waived when applying online

eligibility.additionalInfo: Offer includes $0 Establishment Fee and is open to new or existing customers applying for a minimum application amount of $100,000 or more. Excludes applications for Internal Refinance of existing facilities. Applications must be received between 31/08/2022 and 30/06/2025 and settled by 30/09/2025. To be eligible to apply online you must be at least 18 years of age, a permanent resident of Australia, applying for yourself or as a married/defacto couple and buying an existing property or refinancing. Great Southern Bank may withdraw or amend this offer at any time without notice.

fees.name: Telegraphic transfer fee within Australia
fees.additionalInfo: Local telegraphic transfer to an account at a financial institution within Australia. Payable where you request a local telegraphic transfer to an account at a financial institution within Australia.

fees.name: Account Information Fee
fees.additionalInfo:
Account informaton fee is payable when customer request the following:
- An annual audit certificate on a Great Southern Bank account
- A copy of a cheque or Visa voucher
- Personal information, traces, document copies (other than those specified above) and/or information pertaining to an account
Where further investigation is required an additional hourly rate of $20 per hour will apply. An estimate of the costs involved will be provided prior to the work being undertaken.

fees.name: Valuation fee
fees.additionalInfo: The establishment fee for non Rate Breaker home loans covers the cost of one valuation. A valuation fee may be payable in the future if Great Southern Bank considers it necessary to revalue the property at any time. The amount of the fee will be subject to the Great Southern Bank panel valuers scale of fees current at that time.

fees.name: Home Guarantee Scheme LMI Premium
fees.additionalInfo:
Applicable only to eligible loans participating in the Home Guarantee 
Schemes including the First Home Guarantee (previously know as the 
First Home Loan Deposit Scheme), New Home Guarantee, Family Home 
Guarantee or Regional First Home Buyer Guarantee. If the Guarantee Certificate expires or is otherwise discharged due to an act or omission undertaken by you or a guarantor, Great Southern Bank may seek to obtain lenders’ mortgage insurance (LMI) in respect of the Loan and in that case, you must pay this fee to reimburse Great Southern Bank for the cost incurred in obtaining LMI. For Contracts entered into prior to 22 June 2022, the applicable premium amount is referred to as a FHLDS LMI Premium or Family Home Guarantee LMI Premium.

fees.name: Arrears Letter Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable where Great Southern Bank sends you a letter in relation to arrears on your account.

fees.name: Default Notice Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Default notice fee is payable where Great Southern Bank sends you a default notice in relation to outstanding arrears on your account.

fees.name: Split Loan Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Split loan fee is payable a split involves two or more separate facilities (accounts). Customers can elect to split their loan facility at time of application.

fees.name: Debt Collection Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Costs incurred in the recovery of outstanding debts vary depending on the nature of the default.  These costs are applied by the Solicitors or independent contractors engaged to undertake action to recover the funds and are debited to the account that is "out of order".

fees.name: Security Adminstration Fee
fees.additionalInfo:
For each security offered to the Great Southern Bank loan. A securities administration fee applies to all secured credit facilities. The securities administration fee represents the average cost based on typical charges incurred in settling loans, including: 
• Progressive drawdowns 
• Bank cheque fee 
• Agent fee 
• Land title search 
• Credit reference fee 
• PPSR searches 
• PPSR charges

fees.name: Discharge Fee
fees.additionalInfo: If you pay out the loan partially or in full where a discharge of security is required, or you request a discharge of a security, a discharge fee is payable (per release or transaction).

fees.name: Redraw Fee
fees.additionalInfo: $200 minimum withdrawal applies in branch.

fees.name: Production Fee
fees.additionalInfo: If you request a title held by Great Southern Bank to be produced to a relevant state’s land titles office for any purpose, a production fee is payable.

fees.name: Re-documentation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Where a borrower requests, and Great Southern Bank agrees, to a restructure of a loan between approval and funding and that change requires amended documentation to be prepared, a fee will be payable.

fees.name: Variation Fee
fees.additionalInfo:
A variation fee is payable if you request any changes to the Credit Contract or Security - for example:
- Re-arrange and/or substitute a security on a mortgage
- Consent to any dealings in relation to property
- Switch from one interest rate product to another, at the request of the borrower
- Where a fixed interest rate has decreased between loan approval and loan funding, at the request of the borrower.

fees.name: Government fees and charges
fees.additionalInfo: Government fees and charges relating to stamp duty and registration are payable on an event causing a change or variation to the transaction and/or security being taken in the applicable state or territory. The amount of the fee will be subject to the relevant government scale of fees current at that time.

fees.name: Solicitors costs
fees.additionalInfo: Solicitors costs are payable where they are engaged to prepare documents or provide advice relating to your matter on Great Southern Bank’s behalf.

fees.name: Foreign currency deposit (draft and cheque)
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when you deposit drafts or cheques drawn on an overseas financial institution. Please note that the foreign agent may also charge a fee. Where a single cheque or draft converts to more than AUD $5,000, Western Union Business Solutions charge a handling fee of $65.00.

fees.name: Outward overseas telegraphic transfer in foreign currency (overseas payment) performed by GSB staff
fees.additionalInfo: Applies when you request that funds (sent in the requested foreign currency) be electronically transferred for credit to another account with an overseas financial institution. fees.additionalInfo: Applies when you request, via GSB Online Banking, that funds (sent in the requested foreign currency) be electronically transferred for credit to another account with an overseas financial institution. Additional fees may be deducted by other financial institutions involved in the transfer. GSB does not have control over these fees.

fees.name: Outward overseas telegraphic transfer in Australian dollars (overseas payment)
fees.additionalInfo: Applies when you request that funds (sent in AUD) be electronically transferred for credit to another account with an overseas financial institution. fees.additionalInfo: Payable on all transactions made in currencies other than Australian Dollars.

fees.name: Visa Debit International
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for all of the following transactions made using your Visa Debit Card: • All transactions made overseas, • All transactions in a currency other than Australian dollars, • All transactions made in Australia where the merchant is located overseas, • All transactions made in Australia where the financial institution or entity processing the transaction is located overseas.

fees.name: Direct Debit Dishonour fee
fees.additionalInfo: Where an inward direct debit is dishonoured due to insufficient funds being in your account to meet the amount of the debit. This fee does not apply to Everyday Edge.

fees.name: Overseas cash withdrawal
fees.additionalInfo: Applies to any cash withdrawal transaction made outside Australia.

fees.name: Cheque Dishonour fee
fees.additionalInfo: Where a cheque written against your account is dishonoured for any reason.

fees.name: Telegraphic Transfer inward
fees.additionalInfo: Where funds are received via telegraphic transfer for credit to your GSB account, the other financial institutions involved in the transfer may charge a fee, which will be deducted from the amount of transferred funds.

features.additionalInfo: Available for new and used vehicles up to 7 years old.
Flexible repayment options - choose to make either monthly, fortnightly or weekly repayments to suit your income and budget.
No penalties for early payout, pay off sooner without being charged a fee.
$0 Monthly or annual fees.
Wherever you are in the world, Great Southern Bank gives you the choice and control to securely manage all of your accounts on a range of devices, the way you want.
Enjoy access to your additional car loan repayments with redraw, so you can use it whenever you need some breathing space. A $200 minimum withdrawal amount applies for redraws conducted in-branch.
Unlimited free extra repayments.

fees.name: Account Information Fee

fees.name: Default Notice Fee

fees.name: Debt Collection Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Costs incurred in the recovery of outstanding debts vary depending on the nature of the default.  These costs are applied by the Solicitors or independent contractors engaged to undertake action to recover the funds and are debited to the account that is "out of order".

fees.name: Establishment Fee

fees.name: Security Admin Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable upfront when Great Southern Bank needs to register a financial interest in the vehicle that is being secured against the loan.

fees.name: Substitute Security Variation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if you request, and we agree to re-arrange and/or substitute a security on a personal loan.

fees.name: Switch variation fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if you request, and we agree to switch your personal loan product to another personal loan product.

fees.name: Telegraphic transfer fee within Australia
fees.additionalInfo: Local telegraphic transfer to an account at a financial institution within Australia. Payable where you request a local telegraphic transfer to an account at a financial institution within Australia.

fees.name: Agency withdrawal
fees.additionalInfo: Where account holders at another credit union requests that GSB process a withdrawal on their behalf.

fees.name: Replacement Visa Debit Card
fees.additionalInfo: Fee applies where a replacement card is requested by a customer.

fees.name: Foreign currency deposit (draft and cheque)
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when you deposit drafts or cheques drawn on an overseas financial institution. Please note that the foreign agent may also charge a fee. Where a single cheque or draft converts to more than AUD $5,000, Western Union Business Solutions charge a handling fee of $65.00.

fees.name: Outward overseas telegraphic transfer in foreign currency (overseas payment) performed by GSB staff
fees.additionalInfo: Applies when you request that funds (sent in the requested foreign currency) be electronically transferred for credit to another account with an overseas financial institution. Additional fees may be deducted by other financial institutions involved in the transfer. GSB does not have control over these fees.

fees.name: Outward overseas telegraphic transfer in foreign currency (overseas payment) performed in Online Banking
fees.additionalInfo: Applies when you request, via GSB Online Banking, that funds (sent in the requested foreign currency) be electronically transferred for credit to another account with an overseas financial institution. Additional fees may be deducted by other financial institutions involved in the transfer. GSB does not have control over these fees.

fees.name: Outward overseas telegraphic transfer in Australian dollars (overseas payment)
fees.additionalInfo: Applies when you request that funds (sent in AUD) be electronically transferred for credit to another account with an overseas financial institution. Additional fees may be deducted by other financial institutions involved in the transfer. GSB does not have control over these fees.

fees.name: Excess coin fee
fees.additionalInfo: Personal accounts: Free, Business accounts & non-account holders - Under $100: Free, $100 and over: 5% of coin amount. Where coin is deposited or exchanged for notes at a GSB branch.

fees.name: Account Information Fee
fees.additionalInfo:
Account informaton fee is payable when customer request the following:
- An annual audit certificate on a Great Southern Bank account
- A copy of a cheque or Visa voucher
- Personal information, traces, document copies (other than those specified above) and/or information pertaining to an account
Where further investigation is required an additional hourly rate of $20 per hour will apply. An estimate of the costs involved will be provided prior to the work being undertaken.

fees.name: Other fees
fees.additionalInfo: All other Great Southern Bank fees are detailed within our Schedule of Fees

fees.name: Arrears Letter Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable where Great Southern Bank sends you a letter in relation to arrears on your account.

fees.name: Default Notice Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Default notice fee is payable where Great Southern Bank sends you a default notice in relation to outstanding arrears on your account.

fees.name: Monthly Service Fee
fees.additionalInfo: $0 monthly account keeping fees

fees.name: Overdrawn or Over limit fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable where you exceed the actual balance or authorised limit of your overdraft facility and the debt is caused by a cheque withdrawal or electronic transaction (including ATM, EFTPOS and Bank@Post transactions and Visa purchases).

fees.name: Debt Collection Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Costs incurred in the recovery of outstanding debts vary depending on the nature of the default.  These costs are applied by the Solicitors or independent contractors engaged to undertake action to recover the funds and are debited to the account that is "out of order".

fees.name: Cheque service fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you request the following: - Purchase of a financial institution cheque;  Stop payment on a lost or stolen cheque; Special clearance on a cheque deposited to a Great Southern Bank account.

fees.name: eftpos Debit Card International
fees.additionalInfo: Payable on all transactions made in currencies other than Australian Dollars.

fees.name: Visa Debit International
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for all of the following transactions made using your Visa Debit Card: • All transactions made overseas, • All transactions in a currency other than Australian dollars, • All transactions made in Australia where the merchant is located overseas, • All transactions made in Australia where the financial institution or entity processing the transaction is located overseas.

fees.name: Direct Debit Dishonour fee
fees.additionalInfo: Where an inward direct debit is dishonoured due to insufficient funds being in your account to meet the amount of the debit. This fee does not apply to Everyday Edge.

fees.name: Overseas cash withdrawal
fees.additionalInfo: Applies to any cash withdrawal transaction made outside Australia.

fees.name: Cheque Dishonour fee
fees.additionalInfo: Where a cheque written against your account is dishonoured for any reason.

fees.name: Great Southern Bank Branch Cash Withdrawals
Telegraphic Transfer inward
fees.additionalInfo: Where funds are received via telegraphic transfer for credit to your GSB account, the other financial institutions involved in the transfer may charge a fee, which will be deducted from the amount of transferred funds.

depositRates.additionalInfo: There is no interest on this product

features.additionalInfo: Faster, simpler, smarter payments. Send super-fast payments via online and mobile banking with the New Payments Platform (NPP).
Create your PayID today in Online Banking. It's easy. Link your Everyday Account to a PayID for easy transfers using just your mobile number or email address.

Alerts that will notify you of account and card transactions, as well as online banking activity. Setting alerts can help you identity fraudulent activity on your account, and notify you when funds are deposited or your funds are low.

Mobile Banking App. For banking on the go, anywhere anytime from the convenience of your phone.
The Boost. If you're looking for a way to achieve your savings goals faster, we've got a clever solution. We call it The Boost, and it'll help you save money as you're spending it!
Wherever you are in the world, Great Southern Bank gives you the choice and control to securely manage all of your accounts on a range of devices, the way you want.
Unlimited fee-free electronic transactions. Enjoy fee free card purchases within Australia, eftpos cash out in store plus free access to thousands of ATMs nationwide.
Pay with your Apple(TM) device using Apple Pay.
Pay with your NFC capable Android(TM) devices using Google Pay.
Pay with your Samsung device using Samsung Pay.

For Everyday Edge Account holders, a 100% (full) rebate will apply to the applicable fee charged by Great Southern Bank for each Visa Debit International Transaction Fee and Overseas Cash Withdrawal Fee debited to your account balance during a current calendar month when you deposit $2000 or more per month and make 5 Great Southern Bank Visa Debit card purchases per month. Conditions apply.

Your minimum repayment for each month will be calculated as the amount that is the greatest (or equal greatest) of:  $35; or 3% of your Closing Balance; AND your Overlimit Amount (if any). If the Closing Balance on your Account is less than $35, the minimum repayment will be the Closing Balance.

features.additionalInfo: $0 Monthly or annual fees.
Need your extra repayments? No worries! All of our business loans come with free redraw. A $200 minimum withdrawal amount applies for redraws conducted in-branch.

Flexible loan options. During the overall term you can choose a variable rate or fix the interest rate for 1, 2, 3 or 5 years as many times as you like. Or apply for an interest only period of up to 5 years at any time. Your loan account number always stays the same. An early payout cost may apply if a fixed loan is terminated during the fixed rate period.
Split Loan alternative. You can request us to split your new business loan - a portion on a fixed rate and the remainder at a variable rate or two different fixed rates.

Longer loan terms = lower repayments. Eligible customers can request an overall term of up to 30 years for loans secured by qualifying residential property or up to 25 years with suitable commercial property security. The term of the loan will be subject to relevant credit criteria, eligibility, terms and conditions, and will vary according to the loan amount, type and location of the security provided.
Choose your security. Secure your loan with residential or commercial property. Or combine with a home loan and use your home equity.
All business loans come with a dedicated Relationship Manager.
Enjoy the flexibility of being able to make unlimited extra repayments without penalty.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Loan purpose must be business related.
Applicant/s Guarantors must be a legal entity registered within Australia.
All individuals, directors, guarantors, trustees, members must be 18+ yrs.

eligibility.additionalValue: All individuals, directors, guarantors, trustees, members must be an Australian Resident.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Applications for Business Loans are subject to credit approval. Property offered as security must be acceptable within policy.

fees.additionalInfo: Payable where Great Southern Bank sends you a letter in relation to arrears on your account.

fees.name: Default Notice Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Default notice fee is payable where Great Southern Bank sends you a default notice in relation to outstanding arrears on your account.

fees.name: Early Payout Cost (EPC)
fees.additionalInfo: When you enter into a fixed rate loan contract, you are effectively locking in the loan interest rate offered to you for an agreed period of time (e.g. 5 years). If you decide to switch or payout your fixed rate loan before the end of your agreed period, you are effectively breaking that fixed rate loan agreement, an EPC that could cost you thousands of dollars may apply. Please refer to our ‘Early Payout Cost Factsheet’ for more information. Contracts entered into prior to 28 September 2021, the amount is referred to as an Early Payout Fee.

fees.name: Property Valuation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: A property valuation fee is payable for each commercial property offered as security. The fee is payable at loan settlement and will be included in your Credit Contract. The amount of the fee will be subject to the Great Southern Bank panel valuers scale of fees current at that time. A property valuation fee may also be charged if Great Southern Bank considers it necessary to revalue the property at any time.

fees.name: Debt Collection Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Costs incurred in the recovery of outstanding debts vary depending on the nature of the default.  These costs are applied by the Solicitors or independent contractors engaged to undertake action to recover the funds and are debited to the account that is "out of order".

fees.name: Security Adminstration Fee
fees.additionalInfo:
For each security offered to the Great Southern Bank loan. A securities administration fee applies to all secured credit facilities. The securities administration fee represents the average cost based on typical charges incurred in settling loans, including: 
• Progressive drawdowns 
• Bank cheque fee 
• Agent fee 
• Land title search 
• Credit reference fee 
• PPSR searches 
• PPSR charges

fees.name: Discharge Fee
fees.additionalInfo: If you pay out the loan partially or in full where a discharge of security is required, or you request a discharge of a security, a discharge fee is payable (per release or transaction).

fees.name: Redraw Fee
fees.additionalInfo: $200 minimum withdrawal applies in branch.

fees.name: Establishment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Establishment Fee irrespective of total loan amount applied for. In some instances, where business loan applications are complex, an application fee may be required before a loan is considered. In these instances, we will advise the borrower of the applicable fee prior to commencement of the application.

fees.name: Production Fee
fees.additionalInfo: If you request a title held by Great Southern Bank to be produced to a relevant state’s land titles office for any purpose, a production fee is payable.

fees.name: Re-documentation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Where a borrower requests, and Great Southern Bank agrees, to a restructure of a loan between approval and funding and that change requires amended documentation to be prepared, a fee will be payable.

fees.name: Variation Fee
fees.additionalInfo:
A variation fee is payable if you request any changes to the Credit Contract or Security - for example:
- Re-arrange and/or substitute a security on a mortgage
- Consent to any dealings in relation to property
- Switch from one interest rate product to another, at the request of the borrower
- Where a fixed interest rate has decreased between loan approval and loan funding, at the request of the borrower.

fees.name: Increase to an existing Business Term Loan or Overdraft
fees.additionalInfo: As a guide, an establishment fee of 0.15% of the total additional loan amount / limit applied for will apply, subject to a minimum fee of $400.

fees.name: Government fees and charges
fees.additionalInfo: Government fees and charges relating to stamp duty and registration are payable on an event causing a change or variation to the transaction and/or security being taken in the applicable state or territory. The amount of the fee will be subject to the relevant government scale of fees current at that time.

fees.name: Solicitors costs
fees.additionalInfo: Solicitors costs are payable where they are engaged to prepare documents or provide advice relating to your matter on Great Southern Bank’s behalf.

eligibility.additionalValue: All individuals, directors, guarantors, trustees, members must be an Australian Resident.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Applications for Business Loans are subject to credit approval. Property offered as security must be acceptable within policy.

fees.name: Account Information Fee
fees.additionalInfo:
Account informaton fee is payable when customer request the following:
- An annual audit certificate on a Great Southern Bank account
- A copy of a cheque or Visa voucher
- Personal information, traces, document copies (other than those specified above) and/or information pertaining to an account
Where further investigation is required an additional hourly rate of $20 per hour will apply. An estimate of the costs involved will be provided prior to the work being undertaken.

fees.name: Arrears Letter Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable where Great Southern Bank sends you a letter in relation to arrears on your account.

fees.name: Default Notice Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Default notice fee is payable where Great Southern Bank sends you a default notice in relation to outstanding arrears on your account.

fees.name: Early Payout Cost (EPC)
fees.additionalInfo: When you enter into a fixed rate loan contract, you are effectively locking in the loan interest rate offered to you for an agreed period of time (e.g. 5 years). If you decide to switch or payout your fixed rate loan before the end of your agreed period, you are effectively breaking that fixed rate loan agreement, an EPC that could cost you thousands of dollars may apply. Please refer to our ‘Early Payout Cost Factsheet’ for more information. Contracts entered into prior to 28 September 2021, the amount is referred to as an Early Payout Fee.

fees.name: Property Valuation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: A property valuation fee is payable for each commercial property offered as security. The fee is payable at loan settlement and will be included in your Credit Contract. The amount of the fee will be subject to the Great Southern Bank panel valuers scale of fees current at that time. A property valuation fee may also be charged if Great Southern Bank considers it necessary to revalue the property at any time.

fees.name: Debt Collection Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Costs incurred in the recovery of outstanding debts vary depending on the nature of the default.  These costs are applied by the Solicitors or independent contractors engaged to undertake action to recover the funds and are debited to the account that is "out of order".

fees.name: Security Adminstration Fee
fees.additionalInfo:
For each security offered to the Great Southern Bank loan. A securities administration fee applies to all secured credit facilities. The securities administration fee represents the average cost based on typical charges incurred in settling loans, including: 
• Progressive drawdowns 
• Bank cheque fee 
• Agent fee 
• Land title search 
• Credit reference fee 
• PPSR searches 
• PPSR charges

fees.name: Discharge Fee
fees.additionalInfo: If you pay out the loan partially or in full where a discharge of security is required, or you request a discharge of a security, a discharge fee is payable (per release or transaction).

fees.name: Redraw Fee
fees.additionalInfo: $200 minimum withdrawal applies in branch.

fees.name: Establishment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Establishment Fee irrespective of total loan amount applied for. In some instances, where business loan applications are complex, an application fee may be required before a loan is considered. In these instances, we will advise the borrower of the applicable fee prior to commencement of the application.

fees.name: Production Fee
fees.additionalInfo: If you request a title held by Great Southern Bank to be produced to a relevant state’s land titles office for any purpose, a production fee is payable.

fees.name: Re-documentation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Where a borrower requests, and Great Southern Bank agrees, to a restructure of a loan between approval and funding and that change requires amended documentation to be prepared, a fee will be payable.

fees.name: Variation Fee
fees.additionalInfo:
A variation fee is payable if you request any changes to the Credit Contract or Security - for example:
- Re-arrange and/or substitute a security on a mortgage
- Consent to any dealings in relation to property
- Switch from one interest rate product to another, at the request of the borrower
- Where a fixed interest rate has decreased between loan approval and loan funding, at the request of the borrower.

fees.name: Increase to an existing Business Term Loan or Overdraft
fees.additionalInfo: As a guide, an establishment fee of 0.15% of the total additional loan amount / limit applied for will apply, subject to a minimum fee of $400.

fees.name: Government fees and charges
fees.additionalInfo: Government fees and charges relating to stamp duty and registration are payable on an event causing a change or variation to the transaction and/or security being taken in the applicable state or territory. The amount of the fee will be subject to the relevant government scale of fees current at that time.

fees.name: Solicitors costs
fees.additionalInfo: Solicitors costs are payable where they are engaged to prepare documents or provide advice relating to your matter on Great Southern Bank’s behalf.

lendingRates.additionalValue: P36M

detailData.name: Commercial 3 Year Fixed - Residentially Secured IO
detailData.description: Apply to pay interest only for terms between 1,2,3 or 5 years whilst at the same time fixing the interest rate for the same period.

listData.name: Commercial Variable - Residentially Secured IO
listData.description: Apply to pay interest only for up to 5 years of the total term on your business loan.

features.additionalInfo: $0 Monthly or annual fees.
Need your extra repayments? No worries! All of our business loans come with free redraw. A $200 minimum withdrawal amount applies for redraws conducted in-branch.

Flexible loan options. During the overall term you can choose a variable rate or fix the interest rate for 1, 2, 3 or 5 years as many times as you like. Or apply for an interest only period of up to 5 years at any time. Your loan account number always stays the same. An early payout cost may apply if a fixed loan is terminated during the fixed rate period.
Split Loan alternative. You can request us to split your new business loan - a portion on a fixed rate and the remainder at a variable rate or two different fixed rates.

Longer loan terms = lower repayments. Eligible customers can request an overall term of up to 30 years for loans secured by qualifying residential property or up to 25 years with suitable commercial property security. The term of the loan will be subject to relevant credit criteria, eligibility, terms and conditions, and will vary according to the loan amount, type and location of the security provided.
Choose your security. Secure your loan with residential or commercial property. Or combine with a home loan and use your home equity.
All business loans come with a dedicated Relationship Manager.
Enjoy the flexibility of being able to make unlimited extra repayments without penalty.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Loan purpose must be business related.
Applicant/s Guarantors must be a legal entity registered within Australia.
All individuals, directors, guarantors, trustees, members must be 18+ yrs.

eligibility.additionalValue: All individuals, directors, guarantors, trustees, members must be an Australian Resident.

fees.additionalInfo: Solicitors costs are payable where they are engaged to prepare documents or provide advice relating to your matter on Great Southern Bank’s behalf.

lendingRates.additionalValue: P60M

detailData.name: Commercial 5 year fixed - Residentially Secured P&I
detailData.description: Lock in the interest rate for 1, 2, 3 or 5 years on our business loan with our fixed rates and know what your repayments will be. Plus, pay off your loan sooner with free extra repayments.

listData.name: Commercial 3 year fixed - Residentially Secured P&I
listData.description: Lock in the interest rate for 1, 2, 3 or 5 years on our business loan with our fixed rates and know what your repayments will be. Plus, pay off your loan sooner with free extra repayments.

features.additionalInfo: $0 Monthly or annual fees.
Need your extra repayments? No worries! All of our business loans come with free redraw. A $200 minimum withdrawal amount applies for redraws conducted in-branch.

Flexible loan options. During the overall term you can choose a variable rate or fix the interest rate for 1, 2, 3 or 5 years as many times as you like. Or apply for an interest only period of up to 5 years at any time. Your loan account number always stays the same. An early payout cost may apply if a fixed loan is terminated during the fixed rate period.
Split Loan alternative. You can request us to split your new business loan - a portion on a fixed rate and the remainder at a variable rate or two different fixed rates.

Longer loan terms = lower repayments. Eligible customers can request an overall term of up to 30 years for loans secured by qualifying residential property or up to 25 years with suitable commercial property security. The term of the loan will be subject to relevant credit criteria, eligibility, terms and conditions, and will vary according to the loan amount, type and location of the security provided.
Choose your security. Secure your loan with residential or commercial property. Or combine with a home loan and use your home equity.
All business loans come with a dedicated Relationship Manager.
Enjoy the flexibility of being able to make unlimited extra repayments without penalty.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Loan purpose must be business related.
Applicant/s Guarantors must be a legal entity registered within Australia.
All individuals, directors, guarantors, trustees, members must be 18+ yrs.

eligibility.additionalValue: All individuals, directors, guarantors, trustees, members must be an Australian Resident.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Applications for Business Loans are subject to credit approval. Property offered as security must be acceptable within policy.

fees.name: Account Information Fee
fees.additionalInfo:
Account informaton fee is payable when customer request the following:
- An annual audit certificate on a Great Southern Bank account
- A copy of a cheque or Visa voucher
- Personal information, traces, document copies (other than those specified above) and/or information pertaining to an account
Where further investigation is required an additional hourly rate of $20 per hour will apply. An estimate of the costs involved will be provided prior to the work being undertaken.

fees.name: Arrears Letter Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable where Great Southern Bank sends you a letter in relation to arrears on your account.

fees.name: Default Notice Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Default notice fee is payable where Great Southern Bank sends you a default notice in relation to outstanding arrears on your account.

fees.name: Early Payout Cost (EPC)
fees.additionalInfo: When you enter into a fixed rate loan contract, you are effectively locking in the loan interest rate offered to you for an agreed period of time (e.g. 5 years). If you decide to switch or payout your fixed rate loan before the end of your agreed period, you are effectively breaking that fixed rate loan agreement, an EPC that could cost you thousands of dollars may apply. Please refer to our ‘Early Payout Cost Factsheet’ for more information. Contracts entered into prior to 28 September 2021, the amount is referred to as an Early Payout Fee.

fees.name: Property Valuation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: A property valuation fee is payable for each commercial property offered as security. The fee is payable at loan settlement and will be included in your Credit Contract. The amount of the fee will be subject to the Great Southern Bank panel valuers scale of fees current at that time. A property valuation fee may also be charged if Great Southern Bank considers it necessary to revalue the property at any time.

fees.name: Debt Collection Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Costs incurred in the recovery of outstanding debts vary depending on the nature of the default.  These costs are applied by the Solicitors or independent contractors engaged to undertake action to recover the funds and are debited to the account that is "out of order".

fees.name: Security Adminstration Fee
fees.additionalInfo:
For each security offered to the Great Southern Bank loan. A securities administration fee applies to all secured credit facilities. The securities administration fee represents the average cost based on typical charges incurred in settling loans, including: 
• Progressive drawdowns 
• Bank cheque fee 
• Agent fee 
• Land title search 
• Credit reference fee 
• PPSR searches 
• PPSR charges

fees.name: Discharge Fee
fees.additionalInfo: If you pay out the loan partially or in full where a discharge of security is required, or you request a discharge of a security, a discharge fee is payable (per release or transaction).

fees.name: Redraw Fee
fees.additionalInfo: $200 minimum withdrawal applies in branch.

fees.name: Establishment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Establishment Fee irrespective of total loan amount applied for. In some instances, where business loan applications are complex, an application fee may be required before a loan is considered. In these instances, we will advise the borrower of the applicable fee prior to commencement of the application.

fees.name: Production Fee
fees.additionalInfo: If you request a title held by Great Southern Bank to be produced to a relevant state’s land titles office for any purpose, a production fee is payable.

fees.name: Re-documentation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Where a borrower requests, and Great Southern Bank agrees, to a restructure of a loan between approval and funding and that change requires amended documentation to be prepared, a fee will be payable.

fees.name: Variation Fee
fees.additionalInfo:
A variation fee is payable if you request any changes to the Credit Contract or Security - for example:
- Re-arrange and/or substitute a security on a mortgage
- Consent to any dealings in relation to property
- Switch from one interest rate product to another, at the request of the borrower
- Where a fixed interest rate has decreased between loan approval and loan funding, at the request of the borrower.

fees.name: Increase to an existing Business Term Loan or Overdraft
fees.additionalInfo: As a guide, an establishment fee of 0.15% of the total additional loan amount / limit applied for will apply, subject to a minimum fee of $400.

fees.name: Government fees and charges
fees.additionalInfo: Government fees and charges relating to stamp duty and registration are payable on an event causing a change or variation to the transaction and/or security being taken in the applicable state or territory. The amount of the fee will be subject to the relevant government scale of fees current at that time.

fees.name: Solicitors costs
fees.additionalInfo: Solicitors costs are payable where they are engaged to prepare documents or provide advice relating to your matter on Great Southern Bank’s behalf.

listData.name: Business Overdraft (residential secured)
listData.description: A Great Southern Bank Business overdraft can help you to closely manage your cashflow without compromising your business goals.

features.additionalInfo: Overdraft approval amount = overdraft limit. Once approved the overdraft limit is loaded on to an Everyday Business Account.
All business overdraft accounts come with a dedicated Relationship Manager.
$0 Monthly service fees. Leaving you with more money to invest in your business.
Only pay interest on your debit balances. No line fees or facility fees.
If the debit balance on your account doesn't exceed the approved limit there's no need for monthly repayment.
Overdrafts can be secured through residential or commercial property.

The amount of the fee will be subject to the relevant government scale of fees current at that time.

fees.name: Solicitors costs
fees.additionalInfo: Solicitors costs are payable where they are engaged to prepare documents or provide advice relating to your matter on Great Southern Bank’s behalf.

lendingRates.additionalValue: P24M

detailData.name: Commercial 2 year fixed - Residentially Secured P&I
detailData.description: Lock in the interest rate for 1, 2, 3 or 5 years on our business loan with our fixed rates and know what your repayments will be. Plus, pay off your loan sooner with free extra repayments.

listData.name: Commercial 1 Year Fixed - Commercially Secured IO
listData.description: Apply to pay interest only for terms between 1,2,3 or 5 years whilst at the same time fixing the interest rate for the same period.

features.additionalInfo: $0 Monthly or annual fees.
Need your extra repayments? No worries! All of our business loans come with free redraw. A $200 minimum withdrawal amount applies for redraws conducted in-branch.

Flexible loan options. During the overall term you can choose a variable rate or fix the interest rate for 1, 2, 3 or 5 years as many times as you like. Or apply for an interest only period of up to 5 years at any time. Your loan account number always stays the same. An early payout cost may apply if a fixed loan is terminated during the fixed rate period.
Split Loan alternative. You can request us to split your new business loan - a portion on a fixed rate and the remainder at a variable rate or two different fixed rates.

Longer loan terms = lower repayments. Eligible customers can request an overall term of up to 30 years for loans secured by qualifying residential property or up to 25 years with suitable commercial property security. The term of the loan will be subject to relevant credit criteria, eligibility, terms and conditions, and will vary according to the loan amount, type and location of the security provided.
Choose your security. Secure your loan with residential or commercial property. Or combine with a home loan and use your home equity.
All business loans come with a dedicated Relationship Manager.
Enjoy the flexibility of being able to make unlimited extra repayments without penalty.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Loan purpose must be business related.
Applicant/s Guarantors must be a legal entity registered within Australia.
All individuals, directors, guarantors, trustees, members must be 18+ yrs.

eligibility.additionalValue: All individuals, directors, guarantors, trustees, members must be an Australian Resident.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Applications for Business Loans are subject to credit approval. Property offered as security must be acceptable within policy.

fees.name: Account Information Fee
fees.additionalInfo:
Account informaton fee is payable when customer request the following:
- An annual audit certificate on a Great Southern Bank account
- A copy of a cheque or Visa voucher
- Personal information, traces, document copies (other than those specified above) and/or information pertaining to an account
Where further investigation is required an additional hourly rate of $20 per hour will apply. An estimate of the costs involved will be provided prior to the work being undertaken.

fees.name: Arrears Letter Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable where Great Southern Bank sends you a letter in relation to arrears on your account.

fees.name: Default Notice Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Default notice fee is payable where Great Southern Bank sends you a default notice in relation to outstanding arrears on your account.

fees.name: Early Payout Cost (EPC)
fees.additionalInfo: When you enter into a fixed rate loan contract, you are effectively locking in the loan interest rate offered to you for an agreed period of time (e.g. 5 years). If you decide to switch or payout your fixed rate loan before the end of your agreed period, you are effectively breaking that fixed rate loan agreement, an EPC that could cost you thousands of dollars may apply. Please refer to our ‘Early Payout Cost Factsheet’ for more information. Contracts entered into prior to 28 September 2021, the amount is referred to as an Early Payout Fee.

fees.name: Property Valuation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: A property valuation fee is payable for each commercial property offered as security. The fee is payable at loan settlement and will be included in your Credit Contract. The amount of the fee will be subject to the Great Southern Bank panel valuers scale of fees current at that time. A property valuation fee may also be charged if Great Southern Bank considers it necessary to revalue the property at any time.

fees.name: Debt Collection Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Costs incurred in the recovery of outstanding debts vary depending on the nature of the default.  These costs are applied by the Solicitors or independent contractors engaged to undertake action to recover the funds and are debited to the account that is "out of order".

fees.name: Security Adminstration Fee
fees.additionalInfo:
For each security offered to the Great Southern Bank loan. A securities administration fee applies to all secured credit facilities. The securities administration fee represents the average cost based on typical charges incurred in settling loans, including: 
• Progressive drawdowns 
• Bank cheque fee 
• Agent fee 
• Land title search 
• Credit reference fee 
• PPSR searches 
• PPSR charges

fees.name: Discharge Fee
fees.additionalInfo: If you pay out the loan partially or in full where a discharge of security is required, or you request a discharge of a security, a discharge fee is payable (per release or transaction).

fees.name: Redraw Fee
fees.additionalInfo: $200 minimum withdrawal applies in branch.

fees.name: Establishment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Establishment Fee irrespective of total loan amount applied for. In some instances, where business loan applications are complex, an application fee may be required before a loan is considered. In these instances, we will advise the borrower of the applicable fee prior to commencement of the application.

fees.name: Production Fee
fees.additionalInfo: If you request a title held by Great Southern Bank to be produced to a relevant state’s land titles office for any purpose, a production fee is payable.

fees.name: Re-documentation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Where a borrower requests, and Great Southern Bank agrees, to a restructure of a loan between approval and funding and that change requires amended documentation to be prepared, a fee will be payable.

fees.name: Variation Fee
fees.additionalInfo:
A variation fee is payable if you request any changes to the Credit Contract or Security - for example:
- Re-arrange and/or substitute a security on a mortgage
- Consent to any dealings in relation to property
- Switch from one interest rate product to another, at the request of the borrower
- Where a fixed interest rate has decreased between loan approval and loan funding, at the request of the borrower.

fees.name: Increase to an existing Business Term Loan or Overdraft
fees.additionalInfo: As a guide, an establishment fee of 0.15% of the total additional loan amount / limit applied for will apply, subject to a minimum fee of $400.

fees.name: Government fees and charges
fees.additionalInfo: Government fees and charges relating to stamp duty and registration are payable on an event causing a change or variation to the transaction and/or security being taken in the applicable state or territory. The amount of the fee will be subject to the relevant government scale of fees current at that time.

fees.name: Solicitors costs
fees.additionalInfo: Solicitors costs are payable where they are engaged to prepare documents or provide advice relating to your matter on Great Southern Bank’s behalf.

fees.additionalInfo: Costs incurred in the recovery of outstanding debts vary depending on the nature of the default.  These costs are applied by the Solicitors or independent contractors engaged to undertake action to recover the funds and are debited to the account that is "out of order".

fees.name: Security Adminstration Fee
fees.additionalInfo:
For each security offered to the Great Southern Bank loan. A securities administration fee applies to all secured credit facilities. The securities administration fee represents the average cost based on typical charges incurred in settling loans, including: 
• Progressive drawdowns 
• Bank cheque fee 
• Agent fee 
• Land title search 
• Credit reference fee 
• PPSR searches 
• PPSR charges

fees.name: Discharge Fee
fees.additionalInfo: If you pay out the loan partially or in full where a discharge of security is required, or you request a discharge of a security, a discharge fee is payable (per release or transaction).

fees.name: Redraw Fee
fees.additionalInfo: $200 minimum withdrawal applies in branch.

fees.name: Establishment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Establishment Fee irrespective of total loan amount applied for. In some instances, where business loan applications are complex, an application fee may be required before a loan is considered. In these instances, we will advise the borrower of the applicable fee prior to commencement of the application.

fees.name: Production Fee
fees.additionalInfo: If you request a title held by Great Southern Bank to be produced to a relevant state’s land titles office for any purpose, a production fee is payable.

fees.name: Re-documentation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Where a borrower requests, and Great Southern Bank agrees, to a restructure of a loan between approval and funding and that change requires amended documentation to be prepared, a fee will be payable.

fees.name: Variation Fee
fees.additionalInfo:
A variation fee is payable if you request any changes to the Credit Contract or Security - for example:
- Re-arrange and/or substitute a security on a mortgage
- Consent to any dealings in relation to property
- Switch from one interest rate product to another, at the request of the borrower
- Where a fixed interest rate has decreased between loan approval and loan funding, at the request of the borrower.

fees.name: Increase to an existing Business Term Loan or Overdraft
fees.additionalInfo: As a guide, an establishment fee of 0.15% of the total additional loan amount / limit applied for will apply, subject to a minimum fee of $400.

fees.name: Government fees and charges
fees.additionalInfo: Government fees and charges relating to stamp duty and registration are payable on an event causing a change or variation to the transaction and/or security being taken in the applicable state or territory. The amount of the fee will be subject to the relevant government scale of fees current at that time.

fees.name: Solicitors costs
fees.additionalInfo: Solicitors costs are payable where they are engaged to prepare documents or provide advice relating to your matter on Great Southern Bank’s behalf.

lendingRates.additionalValue: P12M

detailData.name: Commercial 1 year fixed - Residentially Secured P&I
detailData.description: Lock in the interest rate for 1, 2, 3 or 5 years on our business loan with our fixed rates and know what your repayments will be. Plus, pay off your loan sooner with free extra repayments.

listData.name: Commercial 1 Year fixed - Commercially secured P&I
listData.description: Lock in the interest rate for 1, 2, 3 or 5 years on our business loan with our fixed rates and know what your repayments will be. Plus, pay off your loan sooner with free extra repayments.

features.additionalInfo: $0 Monthly or annual fees.
Need your extra repayments? No worries! All of our business loans come with free redraw. A $200 minimum withdrawal amount applies for redraws conducted in-branch.

Flexible loan options. During the overall term you can choose a variable rate or fix the interest rate for 1, 2, 3 or 5 years as many times as you like. Or apply for an interest only period of up to 5 years at any time. Your loan account number always stays the same. An early payout cost may apply if a fixed loan is terminated during the fixed rate period.
Split Loan alternative. You can request us to split your new business loan - a portion on a fixed rate and the remainder at a variable rate or two different fixed rates.

Longer loan terms = lower repayments. Eligible customers can request an overall term of up to 30 years for loans secured by qualifying residential property or up to 25 years with suitable commercial property security. The term of the loan will be subject to relevant credit criteria, eligibility, terms and conditions, and will vary according to the loan amount, type and location of the security provided.
Choose your security. Secure your loan with residential or commercial property. Or combine with a home loan and use your home equity.
All business loans come with a dedicated Relationship Manager.
Enjoy the flexibility of being able to make unlimited extra repayments without penalty.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Loan purpose must be business related.
Applicant/s Guarantors must be a legal entity registered within Australia.
All individuals, directors, guarantors, trustees, members must be 18+ yrs.

eligibility.additionalValue: All individuals, directors, guarantors, trustees, members must be an Australian Resident.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Applications for Business Loans are subject to credit approval. Property offered as security must be acceptable within policy.

fees.name: Account Information Fee
fees.additionalInfo:
Account informaton fee is payable when customer request the following:
- An annual audit certificate on a Great Southern Bank account
- A copy of a cheque or Visa voucher
- Personal information, traces, document copies (other than those specified above) and/or information pertaining to an account
Where further investigation is required an additional hourly rate of $20 per hour will apply. An estimate of the costs involved will be provided prior to the work being undertaken.

fees.name: Arrears Letter Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable where Great Southern Bank sends you a letter in relation to arrears on your account.

fees.name: Default Notice Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Default notice fee is payable where Great Southern Bank sends you a default notice in relation to outstanding arrears on your account.

fees.name: Early Payout Cost (EPC)
fees.additionalInfo: When you enter into a fixed rate loan contract, you are effectively locking in the loan interest rate offered to you for an agreed period of time (e.g. 5 years). If you decide to switch or payout your fixed rate loan before the end of your agreed period, you are effectively breaking that fixed rate loan agreement, an EPC that could cost you thousands of dollars may apply. Please refer to our ‘Early Payout Cost Factsheet’ for more information. Contracts entered into prior to 28 September 2021, the amount is referred to as an Early Payout Fee.

fees.name: Property Valuation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: A property valuation fee is payable for each commercial property offered as security. The fee is payable at loan settlement and will be included in your Credit Contract. The amount of the fee will be subject to the Great Southern Bank panel valuers scale of fees current at that time. A property valuation fee may also be charged if Great Southern Bank considers it necessary to revalue the property at any time.

Split Loan alternative. You can request us to split your new business loan - a portion on a fixed rate and the remainder at a variable rate or two different fixed rates.

Longer loan terms = lower repayments. Eligible customers can request an overall term of up to 30 years for loans secured by qualifying residential property or up to 25 years with suitable commercial property security. The term of the loan will be subject to relevant credit criteria, eligibility, terms and conditions, and will vary according to the loan amount, type and location of the security provided.
Choose your security. Secure your loan with residential or commercial property. Or combine with a home loan and use your home equity.
All business loans come with a dedicated Relationship Manager.
Enjoy the flexibility of being able to make unlimited extra repayments without penalty.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Loan purpose must be business related.
Applicant/s Guarantors must be a legal entity registered within Australia.
All individuals, directors, guarantors, trustees, members must be 18+ yrs.

eligibility.additionalValue: All individuals, directors, guarantors, trustees, members must be an Australian Resident.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Applications for Business Loans are subject to credit approval. Property offered as security must be acceptable within policy.

fees.name: Account Information Fee
fees.additionalInfo:
Account informaton fee is payable when customer request the following:
- An annual audit certificate on a Great Southern Bank account
- A copy of a cheque or Visa voucher
- Personal information, traces, document copies (other than those specified above) and/or information pertaining to an account
Where further investigation is required an additional hourly rate of $20 per hour will apply. An estimate of the costs involved will be provided prior to the work being undertaken.

fees.name: Arrears Letter Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable where Great Southern Bank sends you a letter in relation to arrears on your account.

fees.name: Default Notice Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Default notice fee is payable where Great Southern Bank sends you a default notice in relation to outstanding arrears on your account.

fees.name: Early Payout Cost (EPC)
fees.additionalInfo: When you enter into a fixed rate loan contract, you are effectively locking in the loan interest rate offered to you for an agreed period of time (e.g. 5 years). If you decide to switch or payout your fixed rate loan before the end of your agreed period, you are effectively breaking that fixed rate loan agreement, an EPC that could cost you thousands of dollars may apply. Please refer to our ‘Early Payout Cost Factsheet’ for more information. Contracts entered into prior to 28 September 2021, the amount is referred to as an Early Payout Fee.

fees.name: Property Valuation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: A property valuation fee is payable for each commercial property offered as security. The fee is payable at loan settlement and will be included in your Credit Contract. The amount of the fee will be subject to the Great Southern Bank panel valuers scale of fees current at that time. A property valuation fee may also be charged if Great Southern Bank considers it necessary to revalue the property at any time.

fees.name: Debt Collection Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Costs incurred in the recovery of outstanding debts vary depending on the nature of the default.  These costs are applied by the Solicitors or independent contractors engaged to undertake action to recover the funds and are debited to the account that is "out of order".

fees.name: Security Adminstration Fee
fees.additionalInfo:
For each security offered to the Great Southern Bank loan. A securities administration fee applies to all secured credit facilities. The securities administration fee represents the average cost based on typical charges incurred in settling loans, including: 
• Progressive drawdowns 
• Bank cheque fee 
• Agent fee 
• Land title search 
• Credit reference fee 
• PPSR searches 
• PPSR charges

fees.name: Discharge Fee
fees.additionalInfo: If you pay out the loan partially or in full where a discharge of security is required, or you request a discharge of a security, a discharge fee is payable (per release or transaction).

fees.name: Redraw Fee
fees.additionalInfo: $200 minimum withdrawal applies in branch.

fees.name: Establishment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Establishment Fee irrespective of total loan amount applied for. In some instances, where business loan applications are complex, an application fee may be required before a loan is considered. In these instances, we will advise the borrower of the applicable fee prior to commencement of the application.

fees.name: Production Fee
fees.additionalInfo: If you request a title held by Great Southern Bank to be produced to a relevant state’s land titles office for any purpose, a production fee is payable.

fees.name: Re-documentation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Where a borrower requests, and Great Southern Bank agrees, to a restructure of a loan between approval and funding and that change requires amended documentation to be prepared, a fee will be payable.

fees.name: Variation Fee
fees.additionalInfo:
A variation fee is payable if you request any changes to the Credit Contract or Security - for example:
- Re-arrange and/or substitute a security on a mortgage
- Consent to any dealings in relation to property
- Switch from one interest rate product to another, at the request of the borrower
- Where a fixed interest rate has decreased between loan approval and loan funding, at the request of the borrower.

fees.name: Increase to an existing Business Term Loan or Overdraft
fees.additionalInfo: As a guide, an establishment fee of 0.15% of the total additional loan amount / limit applied for will apply, subject to a minimum fee of $400.

fees.name: Government fees and charges
fees.additionalInfo: Government fees and charges relating to stamp duty and registration are payable on an event causing a change or variation to the transaction and/or security being taken in the applicable state or territory. The amount of the fee will be subject to the relevant government scale of fees current at that time.

fees.name: Solicitors costs
fees.additionalInfo: Solicitors costs are payable where they are engaged to prepare documents or provide advice relating to your matter on Great Southern Bank’s behalf.

lendingRates.additionalValue: P12M

An early payout cost may apply if a fixed loan is terminated during the fixed rate period.
